class.name: EditorScriptEditor
class.description: [b]Note:[/b] This class shouldn't be instantiated directly. Instead, access the singleton using [method EditorInterface.get_script_editor].

method.name: get_base_editor
method.description: Returns the underlying [Control] used for editing scripts. For text scripts, this is a [TextEdit].

method.name: get_current_script
method.description: Returns a [Script] that is currently active in editor.

method.name: get_open_scripts
method.description: Returns an array with all [Script] objects which are currently open in editor.

method.name: goto_line
method.description: Goes to the specified line in the current script.

method.name: open_script_create_dialog
method.description: Opens the script create dialog. The script will extend [code]base_name[/code]. The file extension can be omitted from [code]base_path[/code]. It will be added based on the selected scripting language.

method.name: reload_scripts
method.description: Reload all currently opened scripts from disk in case the file contents are newer.

signal.name: editor_script_changed
signal.description: Emitted when user changed active script. Argument is a freshly activated [Script].

signal.name: script_close
signal.description: Emitted when editor is about to close the active script. Argument is a [Script] that is going to be closed.
